Name: Adamantite Staff
ToolTip: Summons an adamantite entity to shoot three pulses at your cursors location

Name: Blackhole Cannon
ToolTip: Shoots a pulse of energy that summons a singularity at the impact zone
AddToolTip: Only one singularity can be active at once

Name: Bloodboil
ToolTip: Slowly boils the blood of enemies around your cursor

Name: Chlorophyte Staff
ToolTip: Rapidly shoots poison energy that explodes into spore clouds

Name: Cobalt Staff
ToolTip: Shoots out two bouncy, reflective bolts of energy

Name: Dark Wave
ToolTip: Sends out a wave of dark energy, that eats away at enemies it hits briefly

Name: Enchanter's Sword
ToolTip: Attacks replenish Mana and increase magical abilities slightly

Name: Hallowed Staff
ToolTip: Summons a barrage of enchanted swords at the mouse cursors location

Name: High Tide
ToolTip: Sends out a droplet of water that will create small tidal waves on impact

Name: Inferno Staff
ToolTip: Sends out a molten flare that will plume into a vertical surge of fire

Name: Jungle's Wrath
ToolTip: Fires out a seed pod that explodes into poisonous spore clouds

Name: Light's Lament
ToolTip: Summons a star fuelled by pure twilight
AddToolTip: When the star collides with a tile, it will unleash a star surge
Only one star surge may be active at once

Name: Mythril Staff
ToolTip: Shoots out three bolts that will attempt to home in on enemies

Name: Orichalcum Staff
ToolTip: Rapidly releases a barrage of powerful petals

Name: Palladium Staff
ToolTip: Shoots out energy that shatters into multiple shards

Name: Spectral Blade
ToolTip: Attacks replenish Mana and increase magical abilities greatly

Name: Spell Book: Spores
ToolTip: Shoots out a homing spore pod that will infect enemies with 'The Glow'
AddToolTip: Should the enemy die, more spore pods will be released

Name: Spell Book: Stalagmite
ToolTip: Creates a wave of heating stalagmites

Name: Terra Staff
ToolTip: Summons a portal at the target location that constantly unleashes an array of devastating attacks
AddToolTip: Only one portal can exist at a time

Name: Spell Book: Time Gate
ToolTip: Channels a large field of time slowing magic
AddToolTip: Enemies and hostile projectiles within the field are slowed

Name: Titanium Staff
ToolTip: Summons a portal at the target location that constantly shoots razor blades at nearby enemies
AddToolTip: Only one portal can exist at a time

Name: True Bloodboil
ToolTip: Violently boils the blood of enemies around your cursor and has a chance to hemorrhage the enemy

Name: True Enchanter's Sword
ToolTip: Attacks replenish Mana and increase magical abilities moderately

Name: True Hallowed Staff
ToolTip: Summons a barrage of hallowed blades at the mouse cursors location

Name: True Light's Lament
ToolTip: Summons a star fuelled by pure evil
AddToolTip: When the star collides with a tile, evil energies will barrage the impact zone

Name: Vessel Buster
ToolTip: Sends out a short range splash of blood

Name: White Knight Mask
ToolTip: 8% increased magic damage
